attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044 - Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition
and Biometric Fee Schedule

I oppose such a substantial increase in fees of adoption expenses as proposed in
USCIS 2006-0044.

An increase of this degree is not justifiable for the level of services provided with
the handling and processing of such documentation (example I600/I600A, N565,
N600).

The proposed increase of fees, by an average of sixty-six percent, far exceeds the
2007 Social Security Administrations cost of living increase of 3.3% and the
Federal "General Schedule" salary increase of 2.2%.

If salaries for the employees managing these forms for the USCIS are increasing
by only 2.2%, how can it be justified to increase service fees by an average of
66%.

Please re-examine the proposed increase for adoption related expense.

Please reconsider the proposed increases for adoption related expenses
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Joseph Spera
